mapper.select: select mem_Id memId, mem_Since memSince, mem_Dob memDob, mem_Gender memGender, mem_Phone memPhone, mem_Email memEmail from member where mem_Id = #{memId}
mapper.insert: insert into member (mem_Id, mem_Pw, mem_Name , mem_Phone , mem_Gender , mem_Dob , mem_Email , mem_Email_Ck , mem_Area , mem_Since) values(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memPhone}, #{memGender}, #{memDob}, #{memEmail}, #{memEmailCk}, #{memArea}, sysdate)
